group_1.textCenter: Hm?
You wanna know the difference between a regular@ol' Magical Girl and a Coordinator?
Well, a Coordinator can Coordinate.@That's about all there is to it.
--But I reckon that's not what y' meant, of@course.
Yep, I getcha. You mean the difference in "how@they're created," right?
Thing is, I'm not a hundred percent sure of it@myself...
When it comes to what we've got in common,@there's... [chara:104100:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:104100:eyeClose_1][chara:104100:lipSynch_1]well, our wish.
Mitama made one heck of a wish, but I wouldn't@say mine was anything to sneeze at either.
Same's true of Yozuru and Sudachi, of course.
In short, a girl who wishes for somethin' real@awful gets stuck with a body that can't fight Witches...
I'm sure you can guess what sort of wish that@would be, eh?
Witches are things that are born from@corruption, an' spread curses...
A Magical Girl is able to dispel that darkness@'cause she wished for hope...
And if, hypothetically, she *couldn't* dispel@it?
Yep, you got it...
It's 'cause we were born from curse-like@wishes, ourselves.
Take it with a grain of salt, of course, 'cause@it's only my personal theory.
No matter how deplorable of a thing they used as@"hope" when makin' their wish...
...Plenty of girls can still hunt Witches with@the best of 'em, far as I know.
So I s'pose it's a mystery, in the end...
